Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Small truncated jar with a flat bottom, barely noticeable neck and a thick beaded lip, endowed with two residual horizontal wavy handles on the upper section of the body. The vessel is red-orange and has been carefully polished on the exterior surface, which is, however, uneven.
